Text.Page:
The cycle never ends. All sorts of undead creatures are lurking on Icefang Inlet. Kill {@LinkCreature:31#8#sepulchral} and {@LinkCreature:31#9#souleater wraiths}, {@LinkCreature:31#10#frostreach sentinels}, {@LinkCreature:31#16#storm naga ravagers} and {@LinkCreature:31#17#predators}, {@LinkCreature:31#22#frosthowl sirens}, {@LinkCreature:31#23#frostclaw sirens}, and {@LinkCreature:31#24#dark arcanists}. And while you're at it, collect some wispy iceflowers, too!

Report to Leuwra at Coastal Overwatch camp when you're finished
Here's your reward for a job well done. We're always eager for more help eliminating our enemies.

I will reward you any time you clear up this region.

Just bring back some of those wispy iceflowers to prove you did the deed.
